verses.1: A lian mahmah Theofilas aw: Eite lakah a piang ngeisa thu a kigente, mi tampi in amau siamna zah ciat tawh lai-in a gelh uh hi.
verses.2: A kipat cil a kipanin amauʼ mit mahmah tawh a mu mite in hong gente uh a gelh uh ahi hi.
verses.3: Kei zong, hih thute khempeuh a kipat cil a kipanin limtakin kantel khin ka hih manin, a thu a kizomzomin nang adingin hong gelhsak leng hoih ding hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.
verses.4: Nang tungah a hong kigen sa thute khempeuh a man taktak na theih nading deihsakna tawh ka hong gelh ahi hi.
verses.5: Judea gam a hong uk sawn kumpi Herod hun laitakin siampi Abijahʼ pawlteʼ sung panin Zekhariah minnei siampi khat a om hi. A ziʼ min Elizabeth hi a, amah zong Aaronʼ suan ahih manin siampi nam mah ahi hi.
verses.6: A nih tuakun Pasianʼ muhna ah a manin gamta uh a, Topaʼ thukhamte le a ngeina khempeuh a zui uh hi.
verses.7: Ahi zongin Elizabeth ciing ahih manin amau nupa in ta nei lo uh a, a nih tuakun zong a teek ta uh ahi hi.
verses.8: Ni khat, ama pawlteʼ sep hun ding a tun ciangin Zekhariah in Pasianʼ mai ah siampi nasep a sem hi.
verses.9: Siampiteʼ hih ngei zel bangin biakna tau tungah, paknamtui kua in hal ding, ci-in ai a kisan ciangin Zekhariah in a ngah hi. Tua ahih manin Topaʼ biakinn sungah amah lut a,
verses.10: amah in paknamtui halin a om laitakin mihonpi dangte a pua lamah thungenin na om uh hi.
verses.11: Tua laitakin Topaʼ vantungmi khat ama kiangah hong kilang a, paknamtui a kihalna biakna tau taklam pangah a ding hi.
verses.12: Zekhariah in vantungmi a muh ciangin lamdang sa mahmah a, a lau mahmah hi.
verses.13: Ahi zongin vantungmi in ama kiangah, “Zekhariah aw, lau kei in. Pasian in na thungetna hong za khin a, na zi Elizabeth in tapa khat a nei ding hi. A min dingin Johan na phuak ding hi.
verses.14: Amah hong suah ciangin nang na lungdam mahmah dinga, midang tampite in zong hong lungdam pih ding uh hi.
verses.15: Topaʼ muhna ah amah mi lian khat hi ding hi. Amah in leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheih zu khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin ne lo ding hi. A suah phet a kipanin Kha Siangtho tawh kidim ding hi.
verses.16: Amah in Israel mi tampi tak, amauʼ Topa Pasianʼ kiangah tunpihkik ding hi.
verses.17: Amah pen kamsang Elijah mah bangin thahatna le vangliatna tawh Pasian mai ah hong mapai ding hi. Pate le tate kilemsakkikin, mihoihteʼ lungsim bang a neih nadingun thumang lo miteʼ lungsim heisak dinga, Topa adingin a kilawm dingin mite a bawl khol ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.18: Tua ciangin Zekhariah in vantungmi kiangah, “Hih na thugen a manna bangci theih ding ka hi hiam? Kei ka teek ta a, ka zi zong lah a teek mahmah ahi hi,” a cih ciangin
verses.19: vantungmi in dawng a, “Kei pen Pasianʼ na a sem Gabriel ka hi hi. Nang kiangah thu hong genin, hih lungdamna thu a ko dingin a hong sawl ka hi hi.
verses.20: Ahi zongin, a hong tung ding ka thugen a hun lai-in um lo na hih manin nangma tunga kong thugen a tun matengin pau thei loin na om ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.21: Tua hun sungteng, mihonte in Zekhariah na ngak uh a, biakinn sungah sau veipi a om manin lamdang a sa uh hi.
verses.22: Amah hong pusuah ciangin pau thei lo ahih manin, biakinn sungah maang mu hi, ci-in a thei uh hi. Pau thei lo ahih manin a khut tawh a lim a lak hi.
verses.23: Biakinn sungah ama nasep ding hun a bei ciangin a inn ah a ciah hi.
verses.24: Tua khit ciangin a zi Elizabeth gai a, kha nga sung inn panin koi mahah a paikhia kei hi.
verses.25: “Tu petpetin Topa in hih bangin kei hong huh a, mi lakah ka maizumna teng hong paih khiatsak ta hi,” a ci hi.
verses.26: Elizabeth a gai zawh kha guk a cin ciangin Pasian in Galilee gam Nazareth khua ah vantungmi Gabriel a paisak hi.
verses.27: Kumpi Davidʼ suan Josef in zuthawl a piak sa Mary tungah thu a gen dingin a sawl ahi hi.
verses.28: Vantungmi in Mary kiangah, “Na lungdam mahmah ding ahi hi. Topa in nang hong ompih a, thupha lianpi hong pia zo hi,” a ci hi.
verses.29: Mary in vantungmiʼ thugen a zak ciangin, bang a cihnopna hi ding ahi hiam, ci-in lamdang a sa mahmah hi.
verses.30: Tua ciangin vantungmi in, “Mary aw, lamdang sa-in lunghimawh kei in. Pasianʼ maipha a ngah na hi hi.
verses.31: Nang gai-in tapa khat na nei dinga, a min dingin Jesu na phuak ding hi.
verses.32: Amah mi lian hi dinga, A Lianpen Pasianʼ Tapa kici ding hi. Topa Pasian in ama pu David mah bangin kumpi-in bawl dinga,
verses.33: Jakob suanlekhakteʼ kumpi hi paisuak dinga, ama ukna bei hun cih omngei lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.34: Tua ciangin Mary in vantungmi kiangah, “Kei, pasal tawh a lum khawm ngei nai lopi, hih thu bangci pian theih ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
verses.35: Vantungmi in, “Nangma tungah Kha Siangtho hong tung dinga, nangma tungah Pasianʼ vangliatna hong om ding hi. Tua ahih manin a hong suak ding a siangtho naungek pen Pasianʼ Tapa kici ding hi.
verses.36: Na beh nu Elizabeth zong thei in. A ciing hi, kici napi-in a teek mahmah zawh nungin naupaii a, tu-in a naupaii zawh kha guk pha ta hi.
verses.37: Tua ahih manin Pasian in a bawl theih loh khat zong om lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
verses.38: Tua ciangin Mary in, “Kei pen Topaʼ nasem nu ka hi hi. Na gen sa bangin keima tungah hong piang tahen,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin ama kiang panin vantungmi a paikhia hi.
verses.39: Tua khit a sawt loin Mary kithawi a, Judea mual tung gam a khua khat ah a va pai pah hi.
verses.40: Zekhariahʼ inn ah lutin Elizabeth a hopih hi.
verses.41: Elizabeth in Mary’ hopihna awging a zak ciangin a sunga a naupaii a hong diang hi. Elizabeth zong Kha Siangtho tawh hong kidim a,
verses.42: nakpi takin kiko-in, “Numei khempeuh lakah thupha ngah pen nu na hi a, na neih ding naungek in thupha ngah ding hi.
verses.43: Ka Topaʼ nu kei kiangah hong hawh nadingin, bang hangin hih bang thu lian kei tungah hong tung ahi hiam?
verses.44: Bang hang hiam cih leh nong hopihna awging ka zak phetin ka sunga naungek nuamin a diang hi.
verses.45: Topa in nang tungah a hong gen thute hong tung taktak ding hi, ci-a upna pen nang adingin a lungdamhuai mahmah ahi hi,” a ci hi.
verses.46: Tua ciangin Mary in, “Ka lungsim in Topa phat a,
verses.47: hong Hon Pasianʼ hangin ka nuam mahmah hi.
verses.48: Bang hang hiam cih leh a neu mahmah a nasem nu, keimah a hong phawk hi. Tu a kipanin a khangkhangin mi khempeuh in thupha ngah nu hong ci ding uh hi.
verses.49: Bang hang hiam cih leh Vanglian Pasian in keima adingin na lianpi hong sepsak hi. Ama min siangtho a,
verses.50: amah a zahtak mite tungah a khangkhangin hehpihna a lak hi.
verses.51: Amah in a hat mahmah a khut zan a, kiliatsakna lungsim a nei mite a thehthang hi.
verses.52: Kumpi vangliante, a tokhom panun khia suk a, mi neute, mi lianin a bawl hi.
verses.53: Bangmah a nei lote tungah na manpha tampi pia a, mihaute, khuthawm guakin a pai khiasak hi.
verses.54: I pu i pate tungah a kiciamna tungsak a, a nasem pa Israel a huh hi.
verses.55: Abraham le a suanlekhak khempeuh tungah hehpihna a piak tawntung ding a phawk hi,” a ci hi.
verses.56: Elizabeth kiangah kha thum sung bang Mary taam a, tua khit ciangin a inn ah a ciah hi.
verses.57: Elizabeth a suah ding hun hong tung ta a, tapa khat hong nei hi.
verses.58: Topa in amah a hehpih mahmahna thu a zak uh ciangin a veengte le a behte khempeuh in a lungdam pih uh hi.
verses.59: Naungek nipikal khat a phak khit ciangin a vun a at dingin hong pai uh a, a naungekʼ min dingin zong a paʼ min mah ahi Zekhariah phuah ding a sawm uh hi.
verses.60: Ahi zongin a nu in, “Hi lo ding hi; ama min dingin Johan i phuak ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.61: Tua ciangin amaute in Elizabeth kiangah, “Na beh sung uh ah hih bang min a nei om nai lo hi,” a ci uh hi.
verses.62: Tua ciangin hih nau min bang phuak ding ihi hiam, ci-in a pa kiangah lim tawh a dong uh hi.
verses.63: Zekhariah in zong laidal khat ngen a, tua tungah, “Ama min Johan hi ding hi,” ci-in a gelh ciangin amaute khempeuh in lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
verses.64: Tua laitakin Zekhariah hong pau theikik a, Pasian a phat hi.
verses.65: A veengte khempeuh in lamdang sa-in lau uh a, Judea mual tung gam sung khempeuh ah hih thu a kitheithang hi.
verses.66: Hih thu a za mi khempeuh in, “Hih naungek a bangci mi hong hi ding hiam?” ci-in a lungsim sung uh ah a ngaihsun ciat uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in amah a huhna thu teltakin kilang hi.
verses.67: Tua ciangin Johanʼ pa Zekhariah, Kha Siangtho tawh kidimin Pasianʼ thu gen a,
verses.68: “Israel miteʼ Topa Pasian phat ciat ni. A mite a huh dingin hong pai-in amaute a suaktasak hi.
verses.69: A nasem pa Davidʼ suante sung panin eite adingin Vanglian Honpa hong pia hi.
verses.70: Amah in tanglai-in a kamsang mi siangthote tungtawnin thu hong gen a,
verses.71: i galte kiang panin hong hotkhiat nading le hong mudahteʼ khut sung panin hong hotkhiat nading thu a hong ciam hi.
verses.72: I pu i pate a hehpih nading le ama thuciam siangtho hong mangngilh loh nading, amah in hong gen hi.
verses.73: I pu Abraham tungah kamciamna kho khat bawl a,
verses.74: i galte kiang panin eite hong hotkhiat nading le launa om loin amah bia-in,
verses.75: i khang tawnin ama mai ah a siangtho, a thumanin i om tawntung theih nading thu hong ciam hi.
verses.76: “Nang, ka tapa na hi a, Lianpen Pasianʼ kamsang pa hong kici ding hi. Ama pai nading lampi a bawl khol dingin Topaʼ mai ah na mapai ding hi.
verses.77: Na mawhna uh hong kimaisak khit ciangin, hotkhiatna na ngah ding uh hi, ci-in ama mite kiangah na gen ding hi.
verses.78: I Pasian lungnem mahmah a, hehpihna hong nei hi. Eite tungah hotkhiatna khuavak hong taangsak dinga,
verses.79: sih ding lauhuaina sungah a om mi khempeuh tungah vantung khuavak hong taangsak dinga, nopsakna lampi ah hong kha ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.80: Tua naungek a pumpi le a lungsim siamna hong khang a, Israel mite lakah a kilaak hun matengin sehnel gam sungah a om hi.
